duties_responsibilities.duty: Retain and upsell a book of restaurant users who are customers of Choco Premium Suppliers.
Identify premium opportunities across the book of business and refer customers to the proper sales channels.
Autonomously manage a portfolio of restaurant accounts, drive adoption of Choco to prevent churn, and maximize app usage at each location.
Analyze trends in user behavior to prioritize actions and make data-based decisions to achieve personal and team KPIs.
Act as the voice of users internally, working cross-functionally with Sales, Operations, Vendor Management, and Product to provide strategic input.

education_certification.credential: 1 - 3 years experience working in Sales and/or a sales-focused Account Management role.
Experience working in SaaS sales and/or B2B environments.
